questions.question: Choose the correct form: 'If she _____ to the gym every morning, she would have stayed fit.'
Which sentence is a correct third conditional sentence?
options: If he play guitar, he would be famous.
If he played guitar, he will be famous.
If he had played guitar, he would have been famous.
If he has played guitar, he would be famous.
questions.answer: If he had played guitar, he would have been famous.

She goes if she has time.
